Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/Lake
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie rrtd SB: Kedzie, Franklin, Sacramento, Washington & Kedzie; NB: Kedzie, Warren, Sacramento, Franklin & Kedzie; street blockage at Kedzie/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kedzie/Lake, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Franklin, Sacramento, Washington & Kedzie.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Warren, Sacramento, Franklin & Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/80th
ShortDescription: SB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 79th, King Drive, 83rd, and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/80th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 79th, King Drive, 83rd, and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/80th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
